name: VEERO METALS
overview:
VEER-O-METALS Pvt. Ltd. - Precision Sheet Metal Fabrication was founded in the year 1965 at Bengaluru, Karnataka (India). Our company is one of the most prestigious manufacturer, supplier and exporter of IP Rated Enclosures, Racks, Sub Racks, Consoles, Chassis, Mechanical Assemblies, Machine Shops, Bus Bar Fabrications, Precision Fabrications and Stamped & Deep Drawn Components. These products are widely appreciated for precision, resistance to corrosion, application of specific design and dimensional accuracy.

Our Products: Metal Enclosures Racks Power Distribution Units Chassis Mechanical Assemblies Machine Shops Precision Fabrications Deep Drawn Components Bus Bar Fabrications Sub Racks Consoles Welded Tanks Stamped Components

Our Quality: Since establishment, we have been focusing on the set of rules and regulations that lead to the destination of complete quality assurance. Our business operations are carried out keeping in mind the stringent quality control measures.

Our Infrastructure: The hi-tech machinery installed in the production unit allows us to suffice the needs of various clients in a prompt and effective way.

Client Satisfaction: Our company prioritizes on attaining complete client satisfaction. We develop precision products to meet our customers expectations.

Why Us?: Over the years, VEER-O-METALS Pvt. Ltd. has emerged as one of the leading names in developing precision sheet metal fabrication parts and assemblies. We develop our products as per the application and specific requirements of our clients.
